Designer - Jersey

Job Context

Dongyi Sourcing Limited (DSL) is a multinational apparel buying hub and exporter. The organization is marching ahead with a vision to deliver world-class service, quality solutions and value-added services to end products for the textile industries. DSL is committed to achieve global level, beginning from fabrics to fashion through market knowledge and experienced sourcing professionals. Global headquarter of Dongyi sourcing is located at North Point, Hong Kong and Global corporate office is located in Dhaka, Bangladesh. Dongyi Sourcing Ltd is searching potential candidates for Designer – Jersey position.

 

Job Responsibilities

  • Create original jersey designs that reflect current trends and brand aesthetics.

  • Develop detailed technical sketches, patterns, and specifications for jersey production.

  • Ensure designs are functional, durable, and comfortable for athletes.

  • Conduct market research to stay updated on current trends, competitor products, and consumer preferences.

  • Analyze feedback and performance data to refine and improve designs.

  • Work closely with the marketing team to ensure designs align with promotional strategies and campaigns.

  • Collaborate with production teams to ensure designs are feasible and meet quality standards.

  • Coordinate with suppliers and manufacturers to source materials and oversee the production process.

  • Maintain and enhance the brand’s visual identity through innovative and cohesive designs.

  • Ensure all designs adhere to the brand’s guidelines and vision.

  • Manage multiple design projects simultaneously, ensuring timely delivery and adherence to deadlines.

  • Maintain detailed records of design processes, revisions, and final outcomes.

  • Present design concepts and prototypes to stakeholders for feedback and approval.

  • Make necessary adjustments based on feedback to achieve the desired final product.

Employment Status

Full-time

Educational Requirements

  • Bachelor’s degree in Fashion Design, Textile Engineering, or a related field. 

Experience Requirements

  • Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in product development, preferably in sportswear or apparel.

  • Strong knowledge of fabric properties, garment construction, and manufacturing processes.

  • Proficiency in design software (e.g., Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop) and technical design tools.

    RMG, Multinational Buying office, Trading office.

Additional Requirements

  • Age limit 35 years

  • Must be fluent in English writing and speaking.

  • Must have advance skill on MS Excel, MS Word & MS Power Point.

Job Location

Dhaka (Uttara)

Salary

Negotiable

Compensation & Other Benefits

  1. Mobile bill

  2. Lunch Facilities: Partially Subsidize

  3. Salary Review: Yearly

  4. Festival Bonus: 2

  5. Performance bonus

  6. On-time salary – Current month’s salary is paid in current monthly only (last working day of each month)

  7. Health Insurance

  8. Medical Insurance

  9. Long-term benefits

  10. PF

If you are passionate to good fit for the position please send your updated CV to

career@dongyi.hk

by 14th July 2024

Note: Please Mention the Position Name in Email Subject.
